profileAlternative.name: Vigyan Jain
profileAlternative.headline: Senior Solutions Architect at MongoDB, Inc.
profileAlternative.summary:
Vigyan has over 12 years of industry experience as an IT professional. Having experience in hands-on delivery, customer advisory, strategy, transformation, projects, and business acumen. He is experienced across a broad range of key industry and market segments including NoSQL, big data, cloud, grid computing and engineered Systems.

He is passionate to use technology and the opportunities it brings to support and enhance product and service offerings, create value and transform processes with a clear customer focus in mind. He enjoys finding innovative solutions to business problems by using state-of-the-art technology - but using technology as a means to a better customer experience, not an objective in itself.

Currently he is working as a Senior solutions architect for MongoDB. He is responsible to drive mongoDB adoption, make customers successful and realize the value of MongoDB. He also worked on Training and Consulting engagements in the region. He was awarded MongoDB club excellence Award FY'16.

His career includes 4 years of professional experience working for Oracle Corporation. He focused on customer requirements and problems, performing PoC and bench marking exercises, identifying stakeholders concerns and matching the needed objectives with appropriate solutions.

Prior to this role, he was with McKinsey & Co as IT Analyst, where his key focus was to develop architectures for highly concurrent, high performance and always available systems.

Vigyan is a proven speaker, having presented at a number of conferences and events for Oracle and MongoDB. More recently, he delivered a session at MongoDB world 2016 where he talked about MongoDB on AWS - EC2 Sizing and Best Practices for WiredTiger. He has also delivered sessions at MongoDB executive seminars in Delhi and Bangalore, where he talked about RDBMS migration to MongoDB. He has been delivering presentations and lectures at other events like partner roadshows.

received.text: Aveek is for sure one of the best leaders and managers that I have ever worked with. He truly has the trifecta: exceptional leadership skills, outstanding customer presence, and unmatched technical skills. This combination makes him a leader to look up to and gives him instant credibility with his peers and teams. His strong people connect makes him easily approachable.

Jason is one of the finest recruiter I have come across. Jason was always available and in constant contact with me during my recruitment process into MongoDB, from the start all the way to the finish line.  He contacted me first and explained the process very clearly and made me comfortable. As a candidate, sitting on the other side of the world, he calmed my nerves before the interviews and provided feedback immediately. He is full of energy, enthusiasm and great asset of our HR team. I wish him the best.
